attributes.action: MPs should reject 32% payrise and accept 1%
attributes.additional_details:
MP should not be asking for an increase of 32%.  If we are 'all in it together' they must surely accept 1% for as long as the same is to be applied to benefits.

They must have an appreciation of the impact of the effective cuts made upon us by them.

If there is fear of MPs leaving the profession, I can assure them plenty of us will be more than happy to step into their places.

Please sign this petition, they must be made to walk away from this rise or we face another summer of riots.
